name: Swift Linux
short_description:
Welcome to Regular Swift Linux, Diet Swift Linux, Taylor Swift Linux, Minnesota Swift Linux, and Chicago Swift Linux!

A new and improved Swift Linux web site is currently under development.  These SourceForge web pages are the backup site being used in the interim.

A new and improved Swift Linux is also on the way.  The next version of Swift Linux will be based on Linux Mint Debian Edition.  It will provide the functionality, smoothness, and superior driver/codec support of Linux Mint with the lightweight operation of the old antiX-based Swift Linux.  Swift Linux will continue to be compatible with the large Debian software repository.

Click on the Files button for more information or to download a copy of the old antiX-based Swift Linux.  The default username and password are "demo".  The default root/admin password is "root".
summary: New, improved web site is under development
